title: Spectating mode
body:
Spectating mode is not functioning correctly for me at the moment. Initially it told me that it could not download the files, then it told me that it could not locate the game to spectate.

I select "spectate game" it loads just a black screen, does nothing for quite some time, then says in a window entitled "Request Failed" "Spectator server data request failed. The game will now exit." I clicked okay and it went back to "You have left a game in progress" with reconnect or quit as options. The first time it gave me two error messages and then I had to use task manager to exit the spectating mode.

replies.body: same here, spectate does not work.

Oh, I would just like to say that the new jungle items look really cool, but I've only used one so far, and Kalista's interactions are really cool :D (She linked to  me as Diana) Looking forward to playing her. Keep up the good work guys :)
